# Draaki Magic Items
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Draaki|draaki]] magic items introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---

- [[Periapt of the Draaki Savage]]
- [[Scales of Bounding Descent]]
